type.name: T:Elysium.Controls.Automation.ProgressAutomationPeer
type.summary: It is a provider for the successors of the class for UI Automation technology.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Automation.ProgressAutomationPeer.#ctor(Elysium.Controls.Primitives.ProgressBase)
method.summary: Creates a new instance of the class .
method.param: An instance of the class , for which the provider will be used.

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.Automation.ProgressAutomationPeer.Owner
property.summary: An instance of the successor of the class , for which the provider will be used.
property.value: An instance of the successor of the class , for which the provider will be used.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Automation.ProgressAutomationPeer.GetClassNameCore
method.summary: Returns such a class name for the successor , which is connected with current object. This method is called by .

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Automation.ProgressAutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlTypeCore
method.summary: Returns a type of the control for the object-successor of the class , which is connected with current object . This method is called by .
method.ensures: The being returned value is a value of AutomationControlType.ProgressBar .

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Automation.ProgressAutomationPeer.GetPattern(System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface)
method.summary: Returns a template of the control for the object-successor of the class , which is connected with current object .
method.returns: If the parameter has a value , and the state of the object-successor of the class is not equal or , the method will return "this", otherwise "null" will be returned.

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.Automation.ProgressAutomationPeer.IsReadOnly
property.summary: Returns a value, which corresponds to whether the control value is read only or not

getter.ensures: The being returned value is True.

property.value: True, if the value is read only; False, if is not. "True" is always returned.

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.Automation.ProgressAutomationPeer.LargeChange
property.summary: Returns a value, which is added to the value of the property or substracted from it, after a "big change" was done (for example, PAGE DOWN button was pressed)

getter.ensures: The being returned value is Double.NAN.

property.value: The "big change" value, which is supported by the control orDouble.NaN, if the control does not support this property. Double.NaN is always returned, because the control does not support this property.

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.Automation.ProgressAutomationPeer.SmallChange
property.summary: Returns a value, which is added to the value of the property or substracted from it, after a "small change" was done (for example, DOWN ARROW button was pressed)

getter.ensures: The being returned value is Double.NAN.

property.value: The "small change" value, which is supported by the control orDouble.NaN, if the control does not support this property. Double.NaN is always returned, because the control does not support this property.
